item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - Elisabeth das Musical (Essen Cast) [2001] - CD RIP 44.1kHz
item.description:
Composed by Sylvester Levay
Lyrics by Michael Kunze
Featuring the voices of:
Pia Douwes (Elisabeth)
Uwe Kröger (Death / der Tod)
Michael Lewis (Emperor Franz-Joseph / Kaiser Franz-Joseph)
Carsten Lepper (Luigi Lucheni)
Jesper Tydén (Archduke Rudolf / Erzherzog Rudolf)
Gabriele Ramm (Archduchess Sophie / Erzherzogin Sophie)
Annika Bruhns (Duchess Ludovika / Herzogin Ludovika & Madame Wolf / Frau Wolf)
Claus Dam (Max)
Mario Adorf (Voice of the Judge / Stimme Des Richters)



Tracklist
~
1. Prologue / Prolog
2. Like You / Wie Du
3. The Last Dance / Der letzte Tanz
4. I Belong to Me / Ich Gehör Nur Mir
5. Elisabeth, Open Up My Angel / Elisabeth, Mach Auf Mein Engel
6. Milk / Milch
7. I Just Want to Tell You / Ich will dur nur sagen
8. Kitsch
9. When I Want to Dance / Wenn Ich Tanzen Will
10. Mama, Where Are You? / Mama, wo bist du?
11. Don't Play the Prude / Nur kein Genieren
12. Nothing, Nothing, Nothing at All / Nichts, nichts, gar nichts
13. The Shadows Are Growing Longer / Die Schatten werden länger
14. If I Were Your Mirror / Wenn ich dein Spiegel wär
15. Ships in the Night / Boote in der Nacht
16. The Veil Descends / Der Schleier fällt
~
Notes:
I do not speak German, so there may be inaccuracies in translation. English song titles and character names are from sources online. Let me know if there are any corrections needing to be made.
Not too sure who plays young Rudolf, so I do not have him listed with the cast above.
This cast recording was released with two covers, shown above. There are no other differences between the two albums.

item.author: angelofmusic
